title: Pool Party Miss Fortune Skin
body: Hey guys I'm aware that the new Pool Party skin for Miss Fortune will be released on the 6.14 patch. However I can't seem to find it in store. Any ideas? Thanks in advanced.

replies.body:
http://i.imgur.com/LU0vQ3V.png

They will be released during patch 6.14. Usually we don't release skins right on patch day but a few days after. It should be in store in the coming days.
